title: The Olive Tree
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, Lebanese
description: Organic vegetarian kitchen and upscale shop, opened Feb 2015. Food is mostly vegan except for cheese. Has a gluten-free bakery and sells organic and specialty foods and groceries. Staff speak Arabic, English, and French.
streetAddress: Sodeco Square, block D, Ground Floor, Achrafieh
